mapper.select: SELECT su.id,su.name,su.account,su.email,su.mobile,su.status,su.role_type roleType,su.user_type userType, DATE_FORMAT(su.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime,sut.province,sut.city,sut.area,log.ip,DATE_FORMAT(log.time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') loginTime FROM t_sale_user su LEFT JOIN t_sale_user_tag sut ON sut.user_id=su.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from t_login_log log WHERE log.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY log.time desc LIMIT 1,1) log ON log.user_id=su.id WHERE su.stateflag=0 AND su.id=#{userId}
